chatgpt_summary: Market positioning suggests late-cycle dynamics with crypto leading risk assets. Consider profit-taking on 25% of positions while maintaining core exposure. Macro backdrop remains supportive but watch for policy pivots.
grok_alt_view: Contrarian signals emerging: whale accumulation despite retail FOMO, institutional caution increasing. Smart money may be preparing for volatility spike around FOMC decision.
action_bias: Scale profits on strength, maintain 70% core positions. No new risk without macro confirmation.
